Name: Ignore third-party scripts
Description: Can I ignore third-party scripts while debugging?

Notes: 1. In the **Debugger** panel, open **Debugger Settings** and select **Ignore Known Third-partyScripts** to ignore the third-party scripts defined in the [x_google_ignoreList](https://developer.chrome.com/articles/x-google-ignore-list/) sourcemaps extension.
References: 2. The ignoreList source map extension, [Chrome Developer Articles](https://developer.chrome.com/articles/x-google-ignore-list/#what-is-ignorelist)
